column4: does anyone know of a program out there that will find out the key to a 64 bit WEB wireless connection?
your welcome, have a look at the aircrack website for a  lot more info / driver patches / tutorials / etc
fyi aircrack-ng is also in the repository, so to install it you can do it via Synaptic or apt-get install aircrack-ng . No need to get it from source (i saw this too late myself ;)
